web.title: Full_Stack_Protocol_v2.0
web.description: Initialize sequence: Zero to Hero. Execute learning modules in order.

modules.title: HTML5 Semantics
modules.desc: Structure of the web. SEO and Accessibility protocols.

modules.title: CSS3 Styling
modules.desc: Visual layer. Flexbox, Grid, and Responsive Design.

modules.title: Version Control (Git)
modules.desc: Time travel for code. Commit, Push, Branch.

modules.title: JavaScript Core
modules.desc: Variables, Functions, Loops, and ES6+ Syntax.

modules.title: DOM Manipulation
modules.desc: Controlling the Matrix. Event Listeners and Dynamic HTML.

modules.title: Async Operations
modules.desc: Promises, Async/Await, and Fetching APIs.

modules.title: React.js
modules.desc: Component-based UI. Props, State, and Hooks.

modules.title: State Management
modules.desc: Redux Toolkit or Context API for complex data flow.

modules.title: Tailwind CSS
modules.desc: Utility-first styling for rapid development.

modules.title: Node.js & Express
modules.desc: JavaScript runtime. Building REST APIs.

modules.title: Database Systems
modules.desc: MongoDB (NoSQL) or PostgreSQL (SQL). Data persistence.

ai.title: AI_ML_Protocol_v1.0
ai.description: Initialize sequence: Data to Intelligence. Model training initiated.

modules.title: Python Syntax
modules.desc: The language of AI. Lists, Dictionaries, and Control Flow.

modules.title: Math for ML
modules.desc: Linear Algebra (Matrices) and Calculus (Gradient Descent).

modules.title: Statistics & Probability
modules.desc: Understanding distributions, mean, variance, and bias.

modules.title: NumPy Matrices
modules.desc: High-performance multidimensional array computing.

modules.title: Pandas Manipulation
modules.desc: Dataframes, cleaning, and preparation for models.

modules.title: Data Visualization
modules.desc: Matplotlib & Seaborn. Seeing the patterns in noise.

modules.title: Scikit-Learn Basics
modules.desc: Regression, Classification, and Clustering algorithms.

modules.title: Model Evaluation
modules.desc: Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and F1-Score metrics.

modules.title: Deep Learning Intro
modules.desc: Neural Networks basics with PyTorch or TensorFlow.

modules.title: Housing Price Predictor
modules.desc: Regression project. Predict value based on features.

modules.title: Image Classifier
modules.desc: Computer Vision. CNNs to identify objects in images.

modules.title: Sentiment Analysis
modules.desc: NLP. Analyze text to determine positive/negative emotion.

app.title: Mobile_Dev_Protocol_v1.0
app.description: Initialize sequence: Cross-Platform Deployment. React Native focus.

modules.title: React Native Basics
modules.desc: JSX to Native Views. View, Text, and Stylesheet API.

modules.title: Expo Framework
modules.desc: Rapid development workflow. Go from code to phone instantly.

modules.title: Flexbox Layouts
modules.desc: Mastering mobile responsiveness and touch handling.

modules.title: React Navigation
modules.desc: Stack, Tab, and Drawer navigators for seamless flow.

modules.title: Passing Params
modules.desc: Data flow between screens and deep linking.

modules.title: Safe Area Context
modules.desc: Handling notches and device-specific insets.

modules.title: API Integration
modules.desc: Axios & Fetch. Consuming REST/GraphQL endpoints.

modules.title: Global State
modules.desc: Zustand or Redux Toolkit for app-wide data management.

modules.title: Async Storage
modules.desc: Persisting data locally on the device.

modules.title: App Icons & Splash
modules.desc: Configuring assets for iOS and Android.

modules.title: EAS Build
modules.desc: Building binary .apk and .ipa files via Expo Application Services.

modules.title: Store Submission
modules.desc: Google Play Console & Apple App Store Connect guidelines.

hardware.title: IoT_Embedded_Protocol_v1.0

modules.title: Electricity Basics
modules.desc: Ohm's Law, Voltage, Current, and Resistance.

modules.title: Breadboarding
modules.desc: Prototyping without soldering. Connecting the dots.

modules.title: Arduino C++
modules.desc: The language of microcontrollers. void setup() & void loop().

modules.title: Digital vs Analog
modules.desc: Reading real-world signals. Temperature, Light, and Motion.

modules.title: Actuators
modules.desc: Making things move. Servos, Motors, and Relays.

modules.title: Serial Comms
modules.desc: Talking to the computer. UART, I2C, and SPI protocols.

modules.title: ESP8266 / ESP32
modules.desc: Wi-Fi enabled microcontrollers. Connecting to the matrix.

modules.title: MQTT Protocol
modules.desc: Lightweight messaging for IoT. Pub/Sub architecture.

modules.title: Home Automation
modules.desc: Integrating with Home Assistant and smart devices.

modules.title: Build a Phantom Node
modules.desc: TUTORIAL: Create a Wi-Fi sensor node for under $5.

modules.title: PCB Design
modules.desc: Moving from breadboard to printed circuit board with EasyEDA.

bot.title: Bot_Construct_Protocol_v1.0
bot.description: Initialize sequence: Discord Automation. Python & API focus.

modules.title: Discord Dev Portal
modules.desc: Creating applications, bots, and generating tokens.

modules.title: Python Primer
modules.desc: Async/Await syntax and basic Python structures.

modules.title: Discord.py Setup
modules.desc: Installing the library and coding your first 'Hello World'.

modules.title: Events & Listeners
modules.desc: Reacting to messages, joins, and reactions.

modules.title: Embed Visuals
modules.desc: Creating rich media responses with colors and fields.

modules.title: Slash Commands
modules.desc: Modern interaction handlers and UI components.

modules.title: MongoDB Atlas
modules.desc: Cloud database for storing user XP and economy data.

modules.title: API Consumption
modules.desc: Fetching external data (Weather, Crypto, News).

modules.title: Cogs & Extensions
modules.desc: Organizing code into modular extensions.

modules.title: Hosting Services
modules.desc: Deploying 24/7 on Railway, Heroku, or VPS.

modules.title: Dockerizing Bots
modules.desc: Containerizing your application for consistency.

modules.title: Sharding
modules.desc: Scaling architecture for thousands of servers.

data-analytics.title: Data_Protocol_v1.0
data-analytics.description: Initialize sequence: Raw Data to Actionable Insight.

modules.title: Python for Analysis
modules.desc: Core syntax, list comprehensions, and data structures.

modules.title: SQL Queries
modules.desc: SELECT, JOIN, and aggregating data from relational DBs.

modules.title: Environment Setup
modules.desc: Anaconda, Jupyter Notebooks, and VS Code configuration.

modules.title: Pandas Toolkit
modules.desc: DataFrames, Series, and handling missing values.

modules.title: Data Cleaning
modules.desc: Filtering noise, formatting types, and outlier detection.

modules.title: APIs & Scraping
modules.desc: Acquiring data from the web using Requests and BeautifulSoup.

modules.title: Statistics 101
modules.desc: Distributions, correlation, and hypothesis testing.

modules.title: Matplotlib & Seaborn
modules.desc: Static plotting: Histograms, Scatter plots, and Heatmaps.

modules.title: EDA Methodology
modules.desc: Exploratory Data Analysis to uncover hidden patterns.

modules.title: Tableau / PowerBI
modules.desc: Building interactive dashboards for stakeholders.

modules.title: Streamlit Apps
modules.desc: Turning data scripts into shareable web apps in minutes.

modules.title: Reporting
modules.desc: Communicating insights effectively to non-technical audiences.

phases.title: 1. The Arcade Core
phases.description: Foundations of game logic: Game loop, delta time, finite state machines, basic 2D vector math, simple physics, AABB & circle collisions.

phases.title: 2. Engine Protocol
phases.description: Introduction to Unity (C#) or Godot (GDScript): MonoBehaviour lifecycle, Scenes, Nodes, Signals, scripting, and IDE setup.

phases.title: 3. Pixel & Sound Ops
phases.description: Creating/importing assets: pixels, sprites, tilemaps, sprite sheets, basics of sound design (SFX/BGM), and asset pipeline workflow.

phases.title: 4. Gameplay Systems Protocol
phases.description: Implementation of core systems like player controller, camera system, NPC logic, input handling, UI elements, and inventory mechanics.

phases.title: 5. Physics & Movement Ops
phases.description: Rigidbodies, colliders, materials, gravity tuning, kinematic movement, character controllers, platformer physics, and raycasting.

phases.title: 6. AI Protocol
phases.description: Implementing AI using finite state machines, behavior trees, pathfinding (A*), steering behaviors, enemy logic, and difficulty balancing.

phases.title: 7. Level Ops & World Building
phases.description: Tilemaps, procedural generation, lighting, world structure, scene transitions, checkpoints, atmosphere design, and progression flow.

phases.title: 8. Deployment Protocol
phases.description: Build pipelines, optimizing performance, compression, packaging, platform-specific builds (WebGL, Android, Windows).

phases.title: 9. Monetization & Live Ops
phases.description: Publishing games, integrating ads or in-app purchases, analytics, community building, versioning, patching, and post-launch updates.
